name: Dog Racer for iPad
description:
On your mark, get set, DOG RACER!!! Just like you remember from the fair or arcade, roll the ball into the holes to race your dogs against the opponents…but wait there’s more!

Now you can take your dog home with you! Win coins as you race to buy new dogs and train them! Feed and care for your dogs as you race to become the best trainer around! Climb the rankings, win leagues and fill your trophy shelf!

Easy to play and ridiculously addictive, DOG RACER will leave you wanting just one more race!

Features:
- Easy to play but much to do!
 - Collect over 25 dogs including the pink poodles, Chihuahuas, Collies, Huskies and more!
 - Train, feed and race your way to the top!
- Compete against 50+ dogs for coins and prizes!
- Aim for colored holes and side targets for cool bonuses!
 - 10 leagues to compete in, start in the lowly copper league and work your way up to win the Platinum trophy!
- Train your dog to improve his special ability!
- 40 levels to unlock new dogs, special gifts and power-ups!

Watch for new updates! More dogs! More leagues! More trophies!

 Also check out:
Horse Frenzy for iPad
Coin Dozer for iPad
Cookie Dozer for iPad
